title: FAKE ALERT: No, this is not a photo of Shashi Tharoor with wives of Pakistani cricketers - Times of India
subtitle: News News: Senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor’s photo with a few women is being shared on social media platforms with a claim that the women seen in the photo
author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
vclaim:
Here is the post:

A photo of senior Congress leader and Party's MP from Thiruvananthapuram Shashi Tharoor is being shared on social media platforms with a false claim. In the photo, Tharoor could be seen posing with a few women.A Times Fact Check reader sent a post made by Facebook user, who goes by the name 'Rahul Singh', to our WhatsApp number, asking us to verify the claim he has made in the post. In the post, Singh has written in Hindi what closely translates to, "When Pakistani cricketers' wives are with Shashi Tharoor, how will they bat?"The same photo is being shared by many social media users with another caption - "There's more to winning a cricket match, than just players hitting a ball. Here's a convincing reason why we won the match - Shashi Tharoor with Pakistan's cricket wives (sic)."The photo is being shared on WhatsApp as well.No, the women seen with Shashi Tharoor in the photo are not wives of Pakistani cricketers. The photo was taken in February, 2018 and the photo was tweeted by Tharoor himself from his verified Twitter handle saying, "With the women of Indore 's Entrepreneurs' Organisation after a three-hour interaction tonight."Here is Tharoor's tweet:Times Fact Check has found the claim that the women seen with Shashi Tharoor in a photo are the wives of Pakistani cricketers to be false.
